Biography

Previous Performance 2016-17:

Barbora was an incredible asset to the 2017 sharks team especially in doubles play. She mainly played at 4th singles with a record of 4-9 but had two matches at 3rd singles and won both of them. Her doubles record was 12-10 overall with partner Lara Meccico (9-7 at 1st, 2-2 at 3rd) and they were ranked as the #13 team in the nation to end the year. She was also awarded the honor of ITA Scholar-Athlete along with being part of the 2017 All-Academic team.

Prior to HPU:

Previous School/Location: Maticni Gymnazium/Ostrava, Czech Republic

Personal:

Hometown: Ostrava, Czech Republic

Parents and Siblings: Miloslav (father), Radomira (mother), Tomas (brother, 28)

Nickname: Spongey

Hobbies: self-development, ice hockey, boxing, hiking, reading

Favorite Foods: My mom’s vegetable curry

Favorite Movies: Gladiator, The Last Samurai, The Lord of the Rings, A Good Year

Favorite Music Artists: Coldplay, Revolta, One Republic, Dave & Sony

Favorite Athletes: Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal, Jaromir Jagr

Major: Psychology

In 10 years where do you see yourself?: I would like to be a sport psychologist that already has enough resources (money, knowledge, time, and will) to work with broad Czech society on its weaknesses

What made you choose HPU?: Great feeling from the open, positive, and understanding communication with our head coach. Lauren was the deciding point that led me to enroll at HPU.
